mapper.insert: INSERT INTO histories (history_id, user_id, course_id, group_id, gpx_file, start_location, start_time, end_time, distance, avg_bpm, avg_pace, avg_cadence, avg_elevation, calories, created_at) VALUES (#{historyId}, #{userId}, #{courseId}, #{groupId}, #{gpxFile}, #{startLocation}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{distance}, #{avgBpm}, #{avgPace}, #{avgCadence}, #{avgElevation}, #{calories}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT h.history_id, h.user_id, h.course_id, h.group_id, h.gpx_file, h.start_location, h.start_time, h.end_time, h.distance, h.avg_bpm, h.avg_pace, h.avg_cadence, h.avg_elevation, h.calories, h.created_at, c.course_name, g.group_name FROM histories h LEFT JOIN courses c ON h.course_id = c.course_id LEFT JOIN groups g ON h.group_id = g.group_id WHERE h.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY h.start_time DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM histories WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT u.profile_image FROM users u JOIN group_members gm ON u.user_id = gm.user_id WHERE gm.group_id = #{groupId}
